    Rational Approaches to Improving Selectivity in Drug Design

    • David J. Huggins*â â¡
      • ,Â 
    • Woody Sherman*Â§
      • ,Â andÂ 
    • Bruce Tidor*â¥â¥#
    View Author Information
    â  Department of Oncology, Hutchison/MRC Research Centre, University of Cambridge, Hills Road, Cambridge, CB2 0XZ, United Kingdom
    â¡ Department of Chemistry, University of Cambridge, Lensfield Road, Cambridge, CB2 1EW, United Kingdom
    Â§ SchrÃ¶dinger Inc., 120 West 45th Street, New York, New York 10036, United States
    â¥Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, â¥Department of Biological Engineering, and #Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139, United States
